summary: Vicky Logan shares the contents of her travel bag, providing tips and showcasing her must-have items for traveling.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a black screen that transitions to a metallic text reading "VICKYLOGAN" against a gradient background. The scene then shifts to a woman wearing a light blue shirt, seated in a room with a zebra-patterned pillow and a plant in the background. She appears to be speaking, as indicated by her hand gestures and facial expressions. A pink speech bubble appears on the screen, displaying social media handles: "@VICTORIOUSLOGAN" and "@VICKYLOGAN," along with icons for Twitter, Instagram, and Snapchat. The woman continues to speak, occasionally gesturing with her hands. She then holds up a black belt, showing it to the camera while continuing to speak. The video maintains a consistent setting throughout, with the woman seated in the same room, and the background elements remain unchanged.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with cheerful Caribbean music, setting a relaxed mood, followed by a woman's voice greeting listeners and introducing a travel-themed "what's in my bag" video, adopting a friendly and slightly humorous tone, acknowledging the bag's expensive nature. The woman elaborates on the bag's quality and longevity.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman wearing a light blue shirt and a necklace is seated in a room with a gray wall and a zebra-patterned pillow behind her. She is holding a brown checkered handbag and appears to be discussing its features. The woman gestures with her hands, pointing to different parts of the bag, and occasionally adjusts her hair. The room is decorated with a plant and a white fluffy object, possibly a blanket or a throw, on the right side of the frame. The woman's facial expressions and hand movements suggest she is explaining or reviewing the handbag, possibly for a video or presentation. The setting is casual and well-lit, creating a comfortable atmosphere for the discussion.
events_list.audio_caption: A single female speaker begins the clip in an informational and friendly tone, advising listeners not to feel pressured to purchase a particular bag just because she owns it, specifying that it is a large Louis Vuitton Neverfull. She emphasizes the bag's spaciousness and multipurpose nature, mentioning it can hold a change of clothes and shoes, and affirming its "never full" quality and great investment potential. She transitions to mention that those not interested in designer items might consider an alternative.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman wearing a light blue shirt is seated in a room with a zebra-patterned pillow and a plant in the background. She holds up a black bag with the word "PINK" in large white letters, showcasing it to the camera. The woman appears to be explaining or discussing the bag, gesturing with her hands and occasionally looking at the camera. The setting is casual and relaxed, with a neutral-colored wall and a white door visible in the background. The woman's facial expressions and body language suggest she is engaged in a conversation or presentation about the bag.
events_list.audio_caption: A female speaker begins by introducing her "gym bag" which she also uses as an overnight bag, made by Victoria's Secret Pink. She notes its affordability and suitability as a carry-on bag, emphasizing its space efficiency and utility as an alternative to a "super huge Neverfull." Her tone is casual and conversational.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman wearing a light blue shirt and a necklace is seated on a couch in a room with a gray wall and a zebra-patterned pillow. She is speaking and gesturing with her hands, occasionally holding up a package of tea bags labeled 'Tea Tree Apple Buds' from the brand 'Grazie.' The package features a floral design and a blue label. The woman appears to be explaining or reviewing the product, using hand movements to emphasize her points. At one point, she places her hand on her chest, possibly to convey sincerity or emotion. Towards the end of the video, text appears on the screen in red, stating '30% OFF! USE THE CODE 'SHOPMYT' on orders,' indicating a promotional offer related to the product she is discussing. The setting remains consistent throughout, with a plant visible in the background, adding a touch of greenery to the scene.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with one female speaker starting with a welcoming tone, stating that she wants to "go ahead and get started with what's on the inside." She mentions that she keeps snacks on top, and that she likes to take "dry goods" with her when she travels. The speaker then elaborates on Graze's snack options, explaining that one can purchase snacks individually without a subscription. She ends by mentioning a coupon code and assuring that no subscription is needed, that one can "buy their snacks when you please." The woman seems to be describing the contents of a box or bag that she is opening for her listeners. She speaks in a fairly upbeat and energetic manner.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman wearing a light blue shirt and a white watch is seated in a room with a gray wall and a zebra-patterned pillow in the background. She holds up a brown package labeled 'graze' and 'vanilla cream,' then transitions to a clear pouch containing various items, including a green tube and a small container. She demonstrates the pouch's contents and emphasizes organization with a text overlay: '+ QUICK TIP! EVERYTHING NEEDS A HOME! HAVE SMALLER BAGS/CONTAINERS FOR DIFFERENT TYPES OF ITEMS SO THEY ARE EASY TO FIND & WON'T GET LOST IN YOUR BAG! NO FLOATERS!' She continues to discuss the importance of organization, gesturing with her hands and occasionally looking down at the pouch. The video maintains a consistent setting and atmosphere, focusing on the woman's presentation and the practical advice she offers.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio starts with a female speaker associating a "snack" with Oscar Proud, referring to "Proud Snacks." The speaker continues, describing a toiletry bag used on planes, and mentioning taking along items needed right away, like lip gloss, body oil, and SPF sunscreen. She also mentions keeping her face moisturized to prevent breakouts while flying. The clip ends with her admitting that she broke out despite her efforts.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman wearing a light blue shirt and a necklace is seen sitting in a room with a zebra-patterned pillow and a plant in the background. She holds a small bottle of perfume in her right hand and a phone in her left. She sprays the perfume on her wrist and then on her neck, while looking at the camera. She then takes out a white tube with a black cap, which appears to be a makeup product, and shows it to the camera. She opens the tube and takes out a small brush, demonstrating its use. Throughout the video, she maintains a calm and composed demeanor, focusing on the products she is showcasing.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a single female speaker, enthusiastically describing her fragrance and makeup essentials. She highlights a "Sell Ocean" perfume, praising its scent as "sexy beach," then mentions a Glossier balm for dry skin, and a brow pencil. Suddenly, the brow pencil is revealed to be used up and she transitions to the Cover Effects perfect pencil, which she keeps on hand for makeup touch-ups.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman wearing a light blue shirt and a necklace is seated on a couch in a room with a gray wall and a zebra-patterned pillow. She is holding a black container and a white hairdryer, which she uses to style her hair. The woman appears to be explaining or demonstrating something related to hair care, as she gestures with her hands and occasionally looks at the camera. The room is decorated with a plant and a white fluffy blanket draped over the couch. The woman's facial expressions and body language suggest she is engaged in a conversation or presentation, possibly sharing tips or instructions about hair styling.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with one female speaker discussing the contents of her travel bag, noting that she doesn't usually wear makeup on a plane but has "little touch up stuff" in a small toiletry bag. She mentions having her "brown sunglasses from Sorella Boutique" and boarding passes. The speaker then notes her "Beats headphones" that are the Solo Wireless model in Rose Gold, and states that the battery charge lasts a long time. The speaker follows up with a reference to a "Girl's Tour" hat, and explains that she likes to carry hats in case it rains or if she needs one due to her current hairstyle. She then mentions the practice of keeping a sweater or jacket with her, unless she is already wearing it.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman wearing a light blue button-up shirt and a delicate necklace is seated on a couch in a cozy living room. The room features a zebra-patterned pillow and a white fluffy throw, adding a touch of style to the setting. The woman appears to be engaged in a conversation, using expressive hand gestures to emphasize her points. She holds a colorful card in her hand, which she occasionally shows to the camera, possibly to illustrate her discussion. The background includes a plant and a mirror, contributing to the room's inviting atmosphere. The woman's facial expressions and body language suggest she is actively communicating, likely sharing information or insights with the viewer.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a single female speaker who conveys advice regarding preparedness for airplane travel. She mentions carrying a jacket or sweater because "you know it be cold on that plane," and also keeping wipes. The speech has a conversational tone. Background noise is minimal.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman wearing a light blue shirt and a smartwatch on her left wrist is seated in a room with a gray wall and a zebra-patterned pillow in the background. She holds up a package of baby wipes, then switches to a yellow package of snacks, and finally a black and white striped pouch labeled "SEPHORA." She proceeds to open the pouch, revealing a marble-patterned card and a white charging cable inside. The woman appears to be explaining or demonstrating the items, with her facial expressions and gestures indicating a casual and informative tone. The setting is cozy and well-lit, with a plant visible in the background, adding to the relaxed atmosphere.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a woman talking excitedly about her "booty" supplies and disinfectant wipes for hotels or when using the airplane bathroom. She describes how "disgusting" she finds airplane bathrooms, saying they're like "a little box of fecal matter" and describes not even breathing when she uses them. She continues, mentioning her Sephora bag full of plugs, cables, and chargers for her electronics. She then describes a marble charger from Urban Outfitters, Apple Watch charger, a charger for her phone, and for her camera which is currently broken and being fixed. She finishes by stating she also keeps a small lotion in her bag.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman wearing a light blue shirt and a smartwatch is seated on a couch in a room with a zebra-patterned pillow and a plant in the background. She holds up a blue bottle, presumably a hair product, and then a pink cloth, which she uses to wipe her hair. She then shows a pink box, likely containing the hair product, and proceeds to open it, revealing a small container inside. The woman appears to be explaining or demonstrating the use of these products, as she gestures with her hands and looks directly at the camera. The setting is casual and homey, with a focus on the woman and the products she is showcasing.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a female speaker describing a "Nivea daily moisture shea butter lotion," before transitioning to describing an "emergency bag." She says it's a bright pink "Ipsy bag" that contains "feminine goods" for when "Flo decides to visit," mentioning "Flo products", "ginger chews," a nail file and deodorant. The speaker explains getting oily skin on planes is from the skin combating lack of oxygen, so it's best to blot off the excess oil to prevent breakouts.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman wearing a light blue shirt and a necklace with a circular pendant is seated in a room with a gray wall and a zebra-patterned pillow in the background. She is holding two black boxes and appears to be explaining or discussing something, using hand gestures to emphasize her points. The woman then opens one of the boxes to reveal a set of jewelry, including a necklace with a circular pendant, which she holds up to the camera to show it in detail. She continues to talk, pointing to the necklace and possibly describing its features or significance. The setting is casual and homey, with a plant visible in the background, adding to the relaxed atmosphere of the scene.
events_list.audio_caption: A female speaker describes keeping her jewelry in a carry-on bag previously. This caused delays at security checkpoints. As a result, she now keeps her jewelry in a purse. She continues describing the contents of the purse, including jewelry items stored in an ASOS box. She assures listeners that she is not trying to harm anyone.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman wearing a light blue shirt and a white watch is seated on a couch with a zebra-patterned pillow behind her. She holds a brown checkered pouch and appears to be discussing its features. The woman opens the pouch, revealing a red interior, and takes out various items, including a red card, a small bottle, and a blue item. She examines each item closely, gesturing with her hands as she talks. The background includes a plant and a mirror, creating a cozy and stylish atmosphere. The woman's facial expressions and hand movements suggest she is explaining the contents and uses of the pouch and its items.
events_list.audio_caption: A single female speaker describes a Neverfull bag and a clutch bag that comes with it. She mentions using the clutch as a wallet and carrying it everywhere. She lists the contents of the clutch, including lip gloss, oil blotting tissues, Nivea cream, tissues, a scent bird scent, debit cards, and ID. The speaker is enthusiastic and conversational. No music or background noise is discernible.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman wearing a light blue shirt and a necklace is seated on a couch in a room with a zebra-patterned pillow and a plant in the background. She begins by holding up a red Louis Vuitton tote bag, showcasing its details, and then switches to a brown Louis Vuitton handbag, highlighting its features. She then presents a small bottle of nail polish, a green packet of snacks, and a pair of black Nike slides, each time explaining their attributes. Throughout the video, she gestures with her hands and occasionally looks directly at the camera. Towards the end, a text overlay appears, reading 'LIKE THIS VIDEO IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO SEE HOW I PACK MY CARRY-ON LUGGAGE! #NOCHECKEDBAGS,' suggesting that viewers can engage with the content by liking the video and following the hashtag for more packing tips. The woman continues to speak, maintaining a friendly and informative demeanor.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a female speaker describing her belongings in her purse, including "poo-poo-ree spray", "extra pair of headphones", "business cards", and "face mask". She explains that she keeps certain items in her purse for travel and to keep her skin happy on the plane. She then shifts to discussing the slides that she keeps in her purse. She says these items are all in her purse for travel and signs off by thanking viewers for watching, asking them to give a thumbs up and saying goodbye.
